message: Bob, I have a unique product I believe you'll be interested in. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity.  I'm offering it to you for $1500000.  Let me know your thoughts.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider offers within the range of $1200000. I hope this revised offer aligns better with your considerations.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  While I value your interest, I'm unable to go as low as $1200000.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1350000.  This reflects the value I've placed on this product.  Let me know if this works for you.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. Given the value I place on this product and my financial situation, I would like to propose a price of $1300000. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle of our current positions.
